title: Configuration file for the 'delete-files' action.
description: The schema for the configuration file for the 'delete-files' action.

$schema.description: The reference to the json schema.

directoriesToExclude.description: A list of directory relative paths that should be excluded from processing. The '.git' directory is always excluded.

items.description: A list of files to delete. A file can have multiple hashes to match multiple versions of the file.

hashes.description: A list of hashes used to match files based on the actual contents. Use 'Get-FileHash' in PowerShell to find the hash of a file.

path.description: An absolute or relative path to the file to delete.

hash.description: The hash used to match files based on the actual contents. Use 'Get-FileHash' in PowerShell to find the hash of a file.
